aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.textMain: I am a front-end developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites. I have experience in creating websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and other technologies. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

join.textProjekt: I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer. If you are interested in working with me, please get in touch.

pokedex.textProjekt: A simple Pokedex app that allows you to search for Pokemon by name and view their details. This project was created using the PokeAPI with Vanilla javascript.

sharkie.textProjekt: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
